name: Rainbow Vision
description:
There is a monitor that shows texts of color names (Blue, Red, Green and Yellow) but there is one problem about this monitor.. something happened and caused a bug to it. the monitor sometimes shows the wrong color of the text. For example (it shows the word "Red" but in blue) and you will have to click on the red dye on the table not the blue one. 

YOU THINK IT'S EASY? THEN TRY IT OUT!

SOLO DEVELOPEMENT

made for the Community Game Jam (Theme: "The Game is a Liar" - 7 days long)

all content in the game are by me including music and pixel art. EXCEPT FOR (pixeltype font and the TextMeshPro asset)
